subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Bonnies trailed the Billikens, the tournament’s top seed, by 10 points at halftime, but they rallied behind a swarming defense and 3-point shooting to take a 71-68 victory.
snippet: The Bonnies trailed the Billikens, the tournament’s top seed, by 10 points at halftime, but they rallied behind a swarming defense and 3-point shooting to take a 71-68 victory.
